pages.text: But how do you get the honey out of the combs? It's a little too sticky to manually dig out of the combs cleanly, and you have MUCH better things to do with your time, I'm sure. Enter the Centrifuge: this machine will spin things really, really fast, separating them by density - in this case, your combs into honey, wax, and other potential extra things.

However, this spinning needs something with a little more oomph than some hot air from burning things. This is where a Generator comes in - by taking hot air from burning things, you can generate oomph! (or as others like to call it, Redstone Flux a.k.a. RF)

Just put a generator next to a centrifuge, give it some fuel, and you'll have your centrifuge up and running in no time!$(br2)Most combs produce honey and wax, which have their uses - some combs, though, will produce special resources in addition to those.
